sections.summary: i am a passionate and technically-skilled marketing automation consultant, committed to building trusted relationships with clients, vendors, colleagues, and people who dream big. my mission is to empower modern marketers and organizations to achieve success, innovation, and business value through marketing automation and technology. my background includes a unique and diverse mix of experience in both corporate and independent/small business settings, creating a well- rounded and distinct blend of strengths including creative, strategic, analytical, optimization/process, communication, and hands-on production. highlights digital marketing innovative? systems integration enthusiastic team player database management strong written and verbal communicator complex problem solving? detail-oriented cross-functional collaboration passionate
